org.tum.opensim.somview
Class Hexagon

java.lang.Object
  org.tum.opensim.somview.Hexagon
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:
DistanceHexagon, NodeHexagon
public abstract class Hexagon
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.Shape

Hexagon superclass - will be inherited by node hexagon and distance hexagon. Since it implements @see Shape , it can be draw with sub pixel accuracy to e.g. a Panel or any class using @see Graphics2D

          If this Hexagon is not a node, this value encodes the distance between two nodes.

Field Detail

distance

protected double distance
If this Hexagon is not a node, this value encodes the distance between two nodes. If the Hexagon is a node, this value is the interpolated value of its neighbors.

The constructor for the Hexagon class.

Parameters:
path - Path that corresponds to the hexagon-shape
map - SOM that this hexagon is part of

getDistance

public double getDistance()
Getter for the hexagon value. This can either be the value of a node or the distance between two neighboring nodes.

Returns:
the value of this hexagon
